title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to the MMQB's Albert Breer about Brady's future. Does he see him still playing NFL football next season? Kyle Austin of MLive shares details from what he saw in the fight between Michigan State players and the Michigan player. And Hall of Fame broadcaster Jim Nantz talks about deciding  to step away from calling March Madness, and when he foresees himself stepping away from doing the Masters.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to the MMQB's Albert Breer about Brady's future. Does he see him still playing NFL football next season? Kyle Austin of MLive shares details from what he saw in the fight between Michigan State players and the Michigan player. And Hall of Fame broadcaster Jim Nantz talks about deciding  to step away from calling March Madness, and when he foresees himself stepping away from doing the Masters.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
